name: Take Back Eggs (1210Games)
description:
A side scrolling, egg throwing political satire game.

Made during a game jam after the 2016 government party conference was held in Manchester, England.

I worked down the road from the event and its pure spectacle inspired the game.

You play a trouble making protestor who has taken it upon themselves to disrupt the days events; at all costs.

Politics, protests and eggs.
https://metro.co.uk/2015/10/04/a-young-tory-just-got-egged-5420873/
